articles.author: Pranav Dixit
articles.title: Amazon allows visa workers stranded in India to work remotely with restrictions. Here's what they can't do. - Business Insider
articles.description: Amazon allows India-based employees affected by H-1B visa delays to work remotely until March, with strict restrictions on coding.
articles.content:
Amazon is allowing employees who arestranded in India because of visa delays to work remotely there until early March, according to an internal memo viewed by Business Insider.

articles.author: Pat Forde
articles.title: Alabama Carries the SEC’s Pride Into a Rose Bowl Reckoning - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: With the league watching the Big Ten pull further ahead, the CFP quarterfinal against No. 1 Indiana is a referendum on whether SEC supremacy is slipping away.
articles.content:
LOS ANGELES The entrenched superiority complex of the Southeastern Conference is on the line this week, and it needs Alabama to come through. If it just means more, the SEC must win more.
